name: A WEEK IN THE LIFE OF A VALET
name_original: A WEEK IN THE LIFE OF A VALET
description:
Be a valet during few days and park cars. Work fast to win a max of tips but don't hurt cars. Can you do the job?

Park cars on the blue area into the parking area.

Drive car marked with an arrow onto the orange area.

Controls (Xbox One):

A : Accelerate

X : Brake

Y : Reverse

RB : Change car

Left stick : Move cursor / car direction

Controls (keyboard):

UP : Accelerate

SPACE : Brake

DOWN : Reverve

LEFT CTRL : Change car

Move cursor with arrows

This game was made in 72h for the Ludum Dare 42th

Ludum page : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/a-week-in-the-life-of-a-valet
